byline.contributor: Michael J. de la Merced contributed reporting.

abstract: Hedge fund consulting firm Gerson Lehrman Group is repositioning itself as 'platform for professional learning,' in attempt to recruit customers from outside Wall Street; shift comes as private equity firm Silver Lake Partners divests its 25 percent stake in Gerson Lehrman.
lead_paragraph: The firm wants to be known as a “platform for professional learning,” reflecting an effort to recruit customers beyond Wall Street.

headline.main: Gerson Lehrman Seeks New Image as Investor Cashes Out

snippet: The firm wants to be known as a “platform for professional learning,” reflecting an effort to recruit customers beyond Wall Street.
